name: Waddle Home
description: The Penguins are trapped and they need your help! Guide them to the Rescue Ship by opening doors and moving blocks, while making sure to help them waddle around traps and escape patrolling guards!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 280 or equivalent Storage: 600 MB available space
